name: Unraveling False Narratives
description: Identifying, analyzing, and deconstructing the false narratives used to control mass perception.

cards.title: Recognizing State-Sanctioned Misinformation
cards.description: Understanding how governments, institutions, and corporations manufacture consent.
bulletpoints: Analyzing mainstream media scripts and repetition cycles.
Identifying psychological priming and cognitive framing techniques.
Tracing the financial and ideological backers of major media outlets.
cards.summaryText: Audit media scripts, expose framing tricks, and follow the funding behind narratives.

cards.title: Exposing Historical Fabrications
cards.description: Challenging false history and exposing revisionist narratives.
bulletpoints: Investigating manipulated historical accounts that serve elite agendas.
Tracing the suppression of alternative historical perspectives.
Understanding how mass amnesia is engineered through controlled education.
cards.summaryText: Investigate tailored histories, surface buried perspectives, and show how curricula erase memory.

cards.title: Countering False Flags and Psychological Operations
cards.description: Deconstructing crisis events designed to manipulate the public.
bulletpoints: Identifying common markers of staged or exaggerated crisis events.
Understanding how trauma-based programming is used to create obedience.
Techniques for maintaining critical thinking in high-emotion scenarios.
cards.summaryText: Flag staged-crisis tells, decode trauma conditioning, and anchor rationality amid chaos.
